des: "'Yummy, mummy!' is something you're bound to hear when you make this delicious breakfast treat.  A simple oatmeal porridge with mashed bananas and melted chocolate make it extra special! You can add raisins and 1/4 teaspoon of cinnamon, depending on what your family likes."
ins: In a saucepan, combine water, oats and salt. Simmer 5 minutes uncovered, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat, cover, and let stand 3 minutes. Stir in brown sugar, banana and chocolate chips.
